name: Log4Shell (Log4j RCE)
description: Remote Code Execution vulnerability in Apache Log4j via JNDI lookup patterns.
mitigation: Upgrade Log4j to v2.17.1+. Set log4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true. Block JNDI/LDAP outbound traffic.

name: SQL Injection (Generic)
description: Unauthorized database manipulation using SQL syntax injection (OR 1=1, UNION SELECT).
mitigation: Use Parameterized Queries (Prepared Statements). Implement WAF rules for SQL keywords. Sanitize all user inputs.

name: Cross-Site Scripting (Reflected)
description: Malicious script injection into web pages viewed by other users.
mitigation: Encode Output (HTML Entity Encoding). Implement Content Security Policy (CSP). Validate Input.

name: Brute Force Authentication
description: Repeated high-frequency login attempts indicating a credential stuffing attack.
mitigation: Implement Rate Limiting. Enable Account Lockout policies. Enforce Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA).
